oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Barber. Geo F. Barber advertisement, 1898.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Geo F. Barber advertisement in Southern Review, An Illustrated Monthly Magazine. Vol. 3, No. 2. May 1898.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: architects; advertisements;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: IF you are PLANNING to BUILD Our Books of Designs and Plans will help you, They will awaken ideas and furnish much helpful information. Our New (1898) Book "Artistic Home Designs" Shows many Beautiful HOMES built from our plans; also Designs for laying out Grounds. Sent for 10 cents, stamps or silver, if you mention price of house wanted. Geo. F. Barber & CO.. Architects, Knoxville, Tenn.
